item.title: Today's Prayer
item.description: January 19, 2025 Today's Verse Psalm 37:27â€“29 [27] Turn away from evil and do good; so shall you dwell forever. [28] For the LORD loves justice; he will not forsake his saints. They are preserved forever, but the children of the wicked shall be cut off. [29] The righteous shall inherit the land and dwell upon it forever. Today's Memory Verse Isaiah 40:28 - Have you not known? Have you not heard?
